sense.def:
To protest about something
pomeni javno reči ali pokazati, da nečesa ne odobravamo.

seg.quote: Labour MPs took to the streets to protest against government economic policy.
The protesters surrendered to the police after about an hour.

sense.def:
To protest that something is the case
pomeni vztrajati, da je nekaj res, čeprav drugi mislijo, da morda ni.

seg.quote: They protested that they had never heard of him.

sense.def:
A protest
je dejanje, pri katerem javno povemo ali pokažemo, da nečesa ne odobravamo.

seg.quote: They joined in the protests against the government's proposals.
There was a wave of student riots, in protest at university conditions.
